metadata.title: CVE-2024-2397 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Due to a bug in packet data buffers management, the PPP printer in tcpdumpcan enter an infinite loop when reading a crafted DLT_PPP_SERIAL .pcapsavefile.  This problem does not affect any tcpdump release, but itaffected the git master branch from 2023-06-05 to 2024-03-21.

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
